score: Your current score. The formula is your selected (Piece Value + Square Value) * Advantage
piece: Each piece has a different value which can be modified with cards.
advantage: Multiplier based on material advantage. Even-material results in a .5 multiplier.
pieceValues: Impoving your piece value will directly improve your Advantage Multiplier.
cardQueue: When you purchase cards in the shop they will display here.
